column5: First off I would like to say happy birthday to Spincast, Happy BDay Bud  The four muskateers(myself,spincast,gman, and frankie65) were off fishing again including our good friend Livetofish85 this weekend. I sure needed the break and head out fishing with good friends. We started off with a few tugs on the line in which didnt produce a thing, so I decided to switch up and match the hatch. On my second cast, WHAM shes on  . Chris then decided to do the same and WHAM another one hit  . Mine was 8lbs 1oz, Chrises was aprox 5 and change. After a little while we had switched spots, only for I to have two quick hits and frank had one on for a few seconds Cest la vie, the fish didnt want to play anymore. , It was great to finally get out again and have that feeling flow through my veins. Thanks guys, I really needed it  Out of respect for a few members, I have blocked the background, sorry guys
It was great to get out again with you guys. Can't wait till we are trolling.

Yeah, it sure felt great to toss some hardware for the first time in three months! Always fun fishing with friends, especially when you make a new one.  Good to meet you after a bunch of pm's, Chris. As for the fishing, the home team beat out us visitors Definitely looking forward to some early season trolling.  I know Rick is climbing the walls waiting to get the boat out
I cant wait either with the new gear to be installed soon

Frank it was great to meet you as well. I will be picking the boat up next week. So we will troll soon. I was thinking of getting it this afternoon but I won't be able to now. Guess I will be holding off the fishing as well.

Was great to get out again guys. thanks for the invite Chris. May have to try out there again before the boat launches - 'cause  trolling season is just around the corner Chris - you have a bigger catch on the way today. Congrats on being a Dad again.   Be sure to share the end  results when she lands
Sounds like you all had a great time     G2G's are always fun no matter where they are held    Great looking browns Vince & Chris Thanks for sharing Jacques
